name: Dog Duty
description:
Drive a small band of misfits on a open world island, using guerrilla tactics to sabotage the Evil Octopus Army.
Dismantle key locations, pilfer enemy supply, rescue teammates with unique skills and loot the enemy hardware.
The game focuses on real-time squad combat. Customize your squad with new members and equipment, and drive different vehicles to achieve your goals.
In Dog Duty you can:
-Drive a variety of vehicles on a vast wasteland;
-Explore the Island, its rivers and its surrounding seas;
-Unlock new characters;
-Customize your squad for each situation;
